### `RHugin`

`RHugin` is an R package that provides an R API for the HUGIN Decision Engine (HDE). The `RHugin` package itself is free software and is distributed under the terms of the [LGPL](https://www.gnu.org/licenses/old-licenses/lgpl-2.1.en.html). The HUGIN Decision Engine is commercial software developed by [Hugin Expert A/S](http://www.hugin.com/) and is required for the `RHugin` package to function (please note that the `RHugin` package is not supported by Hugin Expert A/S).


***

### Installing `RHugin`
             
The `RHugin` package is supported on all the platforms where the HUGIN Decision Engine is supported. Installation instructions are platform dependent.

1. [Microsoft Windows](InstallingRHuginWindows.html)
2. [Mac OS X](InstallingRHuginMacOSX.html)
3. [Linux](InstallingRHuginLinux.html)
